content: Just be warned that as the battle progresses, he'll come out of his vanishing act with another attack prepped, so you'll need to both find his new position (or listen for it), and react quickly.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow'.
The content is as follows:
Just be warned that as the battle progresses, he'll come out of his vanishing act with another attack prepped, so you'll need to both find his new position (or listen for it), and react quickly.
